sqls.sql: SELECT pd_wks_h_id, mtr_part_no, mtr_part_idt, mtr_part_qty, pd_wks_bom_rmk1, pd_wks_bom_rmk2, pd_wks_bom_rmk3, pd_wks_bom_rmk4, pd_wks_bom_rmk5, pd_wks_bom_rmk6, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM pd_wks_bom WHERE pd_wks_h_id = @pd_wks_h_id OR pd_wks_bom_id = @pd_wks_bom_id;
DELETE FROM pd_wks_bom WHERE pd_wks_h_id = @pd_wks_h_id OR pd_wks_bom_id = @pd_wks_bom_id;
